FireBladeMod:Swipe.NAME: Swipe
FireBladeMod:Swipe.DESCRIPTION: Soulbound. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

FireBladeMod:BasicSmash.NAME: Basic Smash
FireBladeMod:BasicSmash.DESCRIPTION: fireblademod:Smash. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

FireBladeMod:SpinningSmash.NAME: Spinning Smash
FireBladeMod:SpinningSmash.DESCRIPTION: fireblademod:Smash. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

FireBladeMod:ComboCleave.NAME: Combo Cleave
FireBladeMod:ComboCleave.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Deal !FireBladeMod:M2! damage to ALL enemies.

FireBladeMod:UnstoppableThrust.NAME: Unstoppable Thrust
FireBladeMod:UnstoppableThrust.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy had Block, gain [E] and Draw !M! card.

FireBladeMod:ComboSlashes.NAME: Combo Slashes
FireBladeMod:ComboSlashes.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !FireBladeMod:M2! damage. NL Deal !D! damage.
FireBladeMod:ComboSlashes.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !FireBladeMod:M2! damage. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !FireBladeMod:M2! damage.

FireBladeMod:SpiritBurn.NAME: Spirit Burn
FireBladeMod:SpiritBurn.DESCRIPTION: fireblademod:Flame. NL Apply !M! fireblademod:Burning. NL Apply !FireBladeMod:M2! fireblademod:Spirit Rend.

FireBladeMod:Shove.NAME: Shove
FireBladeMod:Shove.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Next turn, gain [E].

FireBladeMod:ComplexAttack.NAME: Complex Attack
FireBladeMod:ComplexAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Strength. NL At the end of this turn, lose !M! Strength.

FireBladeMod:ScorchingStrike.NAME: Scorching Strike
FireBladeMod:ScorchingStrike.DESCRIPTION: fireblademod:Flame. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! fireblademod:Burning.

FireBladeMod:ComplexDefense.NAME: Complex Defense
FireBladeMod:ComplexDefense.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. NL At the end of this turn, lose !M! Dexterity.

FireBladeMod:IronEndurance.NAME: Iron Endurance
FireBladeMod:IronEndurance.DESCRIPTION: fireblademod:Endurance. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

FireBladeMod:Turtle.NAME: Turtle
FireBladeMod:Turtle.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, draw 1 additional card.

FireBladeMod:SteadyEndurance.NAME: Steady Endurance
FireBladeMod:SteadyEndurance.DESCRIPTION: fireblademod:Endurance. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Next turn, gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

FireBladeMod:ArmSmash.NAME: Arm Smash
FireBladeMod:ArmSmash.DESCRIPTION: fireblademod:Smash. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Exhaust.

FireBladeMod:TorsoSmash.NAME: Torso Smash
FireBladeMod:TorsoSmash.DESCRIPTION: fireblademod:Smash. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

FireBladeMod:WildSlashes.NAME: Wild Slashes
FireBladeMod:WildSlashes.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy X times. NL This card gains !M! damage per enemy.

FireBladeMod:EruptionSlash.NAME: Eruption Slash
FireBladeMod:EruptionSlash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage plus 1 per fireblademod:Burning.

FireBladeMod:ProbingAttack.NAME: Probing Attack
FireBladeMod:ProbingAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy intends to attack, gain !B! Block. NL Else, deal !M! damage.

FireBladeMod:SoulCut.NAME: Soul Cut
FireBladeMod:SoulCut.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! fireblademod:Spirit Rend.

FireBladeMod:SmokySwing.NAME: Smoky Swing
FireBladeMod:SmokySwing.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable.

FireBladeMod:SteelEndurance.NAME: Steel Endurance
FireBladeMod:SteelEndurance.DESCRIPTION: fireblademod:Endurance. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Artifact. NL Exhaust.

FireBladeMod:DoubleDash.NAME: Double Dash
FireBladeMod:DoubleDash.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Next turn, draw !FireBladeMod:M2! cards.
FireBladeMod:DoubleDash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Next turn, draw !FireBladeMod:M2! cards.

FireBladeMod:Fireball.NAME: Fireball
FireBladeMod:Fireball.DESCRIPTION: fireblademod:Flame. NL Apply !M! fireblademod:Burning to ALL enemies.

FireBladeMod:RegenerativeEndurance.NAME: Healthy Endurance
FireBladeMod:RegenerativeEndurance.DESCRIPTION: fireblademod:Endurance. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

FireBladeMod:Arson.NAME: Arson
FireBladeMod:Arson.DESCRIPTION: Add a random fireblademod:Flame card into your hand. NL It costs 1 less this turn. NL Exhaust.

FireBladeMod:AbsorbEnergy.NAME: Absorb Energy
FireBladeMod:AbsorbEnergy.DESCRIPTION: Next time you lose HP, gain !M! Strength.

FireBladeMod:AdrenalineBoost.NAME: Adrenaline Boost
FireBladeMod:AdrenalineBoost.DESCRIPTION: Put a fireblademod:Smash or fireblademod:Endurance card from your draw pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.
FireBladeMod:AdrenalineBoost.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Put a fireblademod:Smash or fireblademod:Endurance card from your draw pile into your hand. NL Exhaust.

FireBladeMod:Unbalance.NAME: Unbalance
FireBladeMod:Unbalance.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you attack this enemy, gain !M! Block. NL Exhaust.

FireBladeMod:Accelerant.NAME: Accelerant
FireBladeMod:Accelerant.DESCRIPTION: fireblademod:Flame. NL Apply !M! fireblademod:Burning. NL Gain !FireBladeMod:M2! fireblademod:Fervor.

FireBladeMod:FireBarrier.NAME: Fire Barrier
FireBladeMod:FireBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Whenever you are attacked this turn, deal !M! damage back.

FireBladeMod:FlashPoint.NAME: Flash Point
FireBladeMod:FlashPoint.DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next fireblademod:Flame card is played twice.
FireBladeMod:FlashPoint.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, your next !M! fireblademod:Flame cards is played twice.

FireBladeMod:SmokeScreen.NAME: Smoke Screen
FireBladeMod:SmokeScreen.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a fireblademod:Flame card, gain !M! Block.

FireBladeMod:BuildUp.NAME: Build Up
FireBladeMod:BuildUp.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Skill card, gain !M! fireblademod:Vigor.

FireBladeMod:Vitality.NAME: Vitality
FireBladeMod:Vitality.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL At the start of your turn, gain [E].
FireBladeMod:Vitality.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain [E].

FireBladeMod:FinalSmash.NAME: Final Smash
FireBladeMod:FinalSmash.DESCRIPTION: fireblademod:Smash. NL Do !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

FireBladeMod:GlassGreatsword.NAME: Glass Greatsword
FireBladeMod:GlassGreatsword.DESCRIPTION: Do !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Decrease the damage of this card by 3 this combat.

FireBladeMod:LightningCombo.NAME: Lightning Combo
FireBladeMod:LightningCombo.DESCRIPTION: Do !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL Deal !FireBladeMod:M2! damage to ALL enemies.
FireBladeMod:LightningCombo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Do !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL Deal !FireBladeMod:M2! damage to ALL enemies twice.

FireBladeMod:DebilitatingBlow.NAME: Debilitating Blow
FireBladeMod:DebilitatingBlow.DESCRIPTION: Do !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak and Vulnerable.

FireBladeMod:EternalEndurance.NAME: Eternal Endurance
FireBladeMod:EternalEndurance.DESCRIPTION: fireblademod:Endurance. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Block is not removed at the start of your next turn. NL Exhaust.
FireBladeMod:EternalEndurance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: fireblademod:Endurance. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Block is not removed at the start of your next !M! turns. NL Exhaust.

FireBladeMod:GatherPower.NAME: Gather Power
FireBladeMod:GatherPower.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, gain !M! [E] and draw !FireBladeMod:M2! cards. NL Exhaust.

FireBladeMod:Improvise.NAME: Improvise
FireBladeMod:Improvise.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! card from your discard pile into your hand. NL Gain [E]. NL Exhaust.
FireBladeMod:Improvise.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put !M! cards from your discard pile into your hand. NL Gain [E]. NL Exhaust.

FireBladeMod:HellFire.NAME: Hellfire
FireBladeMod:HellFire.DESCRIPTION: fireblademod:Flame. NL Apply !M! fireblademod:Burning. NL fireblademod:Fervor affects this card !FireBladeMod:M2! times.

FireBladeMod:AfterBurn.NAME: After Burn
FireBladeMod:AfterBurn.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, gain !M! fireblademod:Flame Barrier.

FireBladeMod:ExtraStrikes.NAME: Extra Strikes
FireBladeMod:ExtraStrikes.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an attack card, deal !D! damage to a random enemy.

FireBladeMod:Shell.NAME: Shell
FireBladeMod:Shell.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block.

FireBladeMod:TargetWeakness.NAME: Target Weakness
FireBladeMod:TargetWeakness.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Existing Weak and Vulnerable on the enemy are increased by !M!.
FireBladeMod:TargetWeakness.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Existing Weak, Vulnerable, and fireblademod:Spirit Rend on the enemy are increased by !M!.

FireBladeMod:FinishingBarrage.NAME: Finishing Barrage
FireBladeMod:FinishingBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each fireblademod:Smash in your exhaust pile.
FireBladeMod:FinishingBarrage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage for each fireblademod:Smash in your exhaust pile.

FireBladeMod:Refreshment.NAME: Refreshment
FireBladeMod:Refreshment.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP for each fireblademod:Endurance in your exhaust pile. NL Exhaust.
FireBladeMod:Refreshment.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Heal !M! HP for each fireblademod:Endurance in your exhaust pile. NL Exhaust.

FireBladeMod:Indomitable.NAME: Indomitable
FireBladeMod:Indomitable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The next !M! times you draw a Status card, Exhaust it and draw a card.

FireBladeMod:BattleMage.NAME: Battle Mage
FireBladeMod:BattleMage.DESCRIPTION: Your attack damage is increased by fireblademod:Fervor. NL Your fireblademod:Flame cards are improved by Strength.
FireBladeMod:BattleMage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your attack damage is increased by fireblademod:Fervor. NL Your fireblademod:Flame cards are improved by Strength. NL Gain 1 fireblademod:Fervor. NL Gain 1 Strength.

FireBladeMod:SmokeInTheEyes.NAME: Smoke In The Eyes
FireBladeMod:SmokeInTheEyes.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable.

FireBladeMod:SwordsmanForm.NAME: Swordsman Form
FireBladeMod:SwordsmanForm.DESCRIPTION: Every time you deal attack damage !FireBladeMod:M2! times, gain !M! Strength.

FireBladeMod:PyromancerForm.NAME: Pyromancer Form
FireBladeMod:PyromancerForm.DESCRIPTION: Your fireblademod:Flame cards apply !FireBladeMod:M2! % more fireblademod:Burning, NL but Exhaust.

FireBladeMod:DesperateDefense.NAME: Desperate Defense
FireBladeMod:DesperateDefense.DESCRIPTION: When your HP is at or below 50%, you have !M! additional Dexterity.

FireBladeMod:Flexibility.NAME: Flexibility
FireBladeMod:Flexibility.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw !M! additional card.
FireBladeMod:Flexibility.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, draw !M! additional card.

FireBladeMod:MomentumStrike.NAME: MomentumStrike
FireBladeMod:MomentumStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills the target, gain [E] and draw a card.

FireBladeMod:BodyAsFuel.NAME: Body As Fuel
FireBladeMod:BodyAsFuel.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your draw pile. NL Play the chosen card. NL Lose HP equal to !M! times its cost.

FireBladeMod:Wildfire.NAME: Wildfire
FireBladeMod:Wildfire.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! fireblademod:Burning. NL Add a burn to your discard pile.
